typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		RottenTomato as short,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'myfilename',
	partitionRootPath: '/output/parts',
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['output/parts/**/**/*.parquet']) ~> ParquetSource
ParquetSource derive(etlyear = year(currentDate()),
		etlmonth = month(currentDate()),
		etlday = dayOfMonth(currentDate())) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		etlyear,
		etlmonth,
		etlday
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> byDate
